bug.author: ananthsub
bug.summary: Utility rank_zero_only doesn't properly handle environment variable LOCAL_RANK
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
The environment variable can be a string. This causes checks in the rank_zero_only decorator to fail here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pytorch_lightning/utilities/distributed.py#L11>https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pytorch_lightning/utilities/distributed.py#L11</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
We should cast to an int both in the rank_zero_only check as well as in the trainer here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pytorch_lightning/trainer/trainer.py#L385>https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/pytorch_lightning/trainer/trainer.py#L385</denchmark-link>
Then the decorator works as we expected
